title: Mama Dida: My Road to Canada
description: After experiencing the second world war tragedies and living through the socio political changes in Romania, grandpa Aurel and grandma Dida, for the love of their beloved grandchildren Darius and Anna, decided to leave family, friends and everything they built in Romania and start a new life in Canada. Nadia Comaneci incredible gymnastic success at the Olympic games in Montreal was what they knew at the time about Canada. Grandpa Aurel and grandma Dida's courage and personal sacrifices were the foundation for the education Darius and Anna accessed in Toronto, and the life they enjoyed in Canada.
author: Leonida Teohari
